Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vedhaththinpadi Nadakkira Uththama Maarkkaththaar Baakkiyavaangal.
2 avarudaiya Saatchigalai Kaikkondu, Avarai Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Thedugiravargal Baakkiyavaangal.
3  Avargal Aniyaayam Seyvadhillai; Avarudaiya Vazhigalil Nadakkiraargal.
4 umadhu Kattalaigalai Naangal Karuththaai Kaikkollumpadi Neer Karpiththeer.
5 umadhu Piramaanangalai Kaikkollumpadi, En Nadaigal Sthirappattaal Nalamaayirukkum.
6 naan Ummudaiya Karpanaigalaiyellaam Kannokkumbodhu, Vetkappattuppovadhillai.
7 ummudaiya Needhi Niyaayangalai Naan Katrukkollumbodhu, Semmaiyaana Irudhayaththaal Ummai Thudhippen.
8 umadhu Piramaanangalai Kaikkolluven; Mutrilum Ennai Kaividaadheyum.
9 vaaliban Than Vazhiyai Edhinaal Suththampannuvaan? Umadhu Vasanaththinpadi Thannai Kaaththukkollugiradhinaaldhaane.
10 en Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ummai Thedugiren, Ennai Umadhu Karpanaigalaivittu Vazhithappavidaadheyum.
11 naan Umakku Virodhamaai Paavanseyyaadhapadikku, Umadhu Vaakkai Ennirudhayaththil Vaiththu Vaiththen.
12  Karththaave, Neer Sthoththirikkappattavar; Ummudaiya Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
13 ummudaiya Vaakkin Niyaayaththeerppugalaiyellaam En Udhadugalaal Vivariththirukkiren.
14 thiralaana Selvaththil Kalikooruvadhupola, Naan Umadhu Saatchigalin Vazhiyil Kalikoorugiren.
15 umadhu Kattalaigalai Dhiyaaniththu, Umadhu Vazhigalai Kannokkugiren.
16 umadhu Piramaanangalil Manamagizhchchiyaayirukkiren; Umadhu Vasanaththai Maraven.
17 umadhu Adiyenukku Anugoolamaayirum; Appozhudhu Naan Pizhaiththu, Umadhu Vasanaththai Kaikkolluven.
18 umadhu Vedhaththilulla Adhisayangalai Naan Paarkkumpadikku, En Kangalaith Thirandharulum.
19 boomiyile Naan Paradhesi; Umadhu Karpanaigalai Enakku Maraiyaadheyum.
20 umadhu Niyaayangalmel En Aaththumaa Ekkaalamum Vaiththirukkira Vaanjaiyinaal Thoindhupogiradhu.
21 umadhu Karpanaigalai Vittu Vazhivilagina Sabikkappatta Agangaarigalai Neer Kadindhukollugireer.
22 nindhaiyaiyum Avamaanaththaiyum Ennai Vittagatrum; Naan Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Kaikkollugiren.
23 pirabukkalum Utkaarndhu Enakku Virodhamaai Pesikkollugiraargal; Umadhu Adiyeno, Umadhu Piramaanangalai Dhiyaanikkiren.
24 ummudaiya Saatchigal Enakku Inbamum, En Aalosanaikkaararumaayirukkiradhu.
25 en Aaththumaa Mannodu Ottikkondirukkiradhu; Umadhu Vasanaththinpadi Ennai Uyirppiyum.
26 en Vazhigalai Naan Umakku Vivariththu Kaattinapodhu Enakku Sevikoduththeer; Umadhu Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
27 umadhu Kattalaigalin Vazhiyai Enakku Unarththiyarulum; Appozhudhu Umadhu Adhisayangalai Dhiyaanippen.
28 sanjalaththaal En Aaththumaa Karaindhupogiradhu; Umadhu Vasanaththinpadi Ennai Eduththu Niruththum.
29 poivazhiyai Ennai Vittuvilakki, Ummudaiya Vedhaththai Enakku Arulseyyum.
30 meyvazhiyai Naan Therindhukondu, Ummudaiya Niyaayangalai Enakku Munbaaga Niruththinen.
31 umadhu Saatchigalmel Patrudhalaayirukkiren; Karththaave, Ennai Vetkaththirkutpadappannaadheyum.
32 neer En Irudhayaththai Visaalamaakkumpodhu, Naan Umadhu Karpanaigalin Vazhiyaaga Oduven.
33 karththaave, Umadhu Piramaanangalin Vazhiyai Enakku Podhiyum; Mudivupariyandham Naan Adhai Kaaththukkolluven.
34 enakku Unarvai Thaarum; Appozhudhu Naan Umadhu Vedhaththai Patrikkondu, En Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Adhai Kaikkolluven.
35 umadhu Karpanaigalin Paadhaiyil Ennai Nadaththum; Naan Adhil Piriyamaayirukkiren.
36 en Irudhayam Porulaasaiyai Saaraamal, Umadhu Saatchigalai Saarumpadi Seyyum.
37 maayaiyai Paaraadhapadi Neer En Kangalai Vilakki, Umadhu Vazhigalil Ennai Uyirppiyum.
38 umakku Bayappadugiradharku Etra Umadhu Vaakkai Umadhu Adiyenukku Urudhippaduththum.
39 naan Anjugira Nindhaiyai Vilakkiyarulum; Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Nallavaigal.
40 idho, Ummudaiya Kattalaigalmel Vaanjaiyaayirukkiren; Umadhu Needhiyaal Ennai Uyirppiyum.
41 karththaave, Ummudaiya Vaakkinpadi, Umadhu Dhayavum Umadhu Ratchippum Enakku Varuvadhaaga.
42 appozhudhu Ennai Nindhikkiravanukku Uththaravu Solluven; Ummudaiya Vasanaththai Nambiyirukkiren.
43 saththiya Vasanam Mutrilum En Vaayinindru Neengavidaadheyum; Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugalukku Kaaththirukkiren.
44 naan Eppozhudhum Endraikkum Umadhu Vedhaththai Kaaththukkolluven.
45 naan Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Aaraaigirapadiyaal, Visaalaththile Nadappen.
46 naan Ummudaiya Saatchigalaikkuriththu, Raajaakkalukku Munbaagavum Vetkappadaamal Pesuven.
47 naan Piriyappadugira Umadhu Karpanaigalinperil Manamagizhchchiyaayiruppen.
48 naan Piriyappadugira Umadhu Karpanaigalukku Kaiyeduppen, Umadhu Piramaanangalai Dhiyaanippen.
49 neer Ennai Nambappannina Vasanaththai Umadhu Adiyenukkaaga Ninaiththarulum.
50 adhuve En Sirumaiyil Enakku Aarudhal, Ummudaiya Vaakku Ennai Uyirppiththadhu.
51 agandhaikkaarar Ennai Migavum Pariyaasampanniyum, Naan Umadhu Vedhaththaivittu Vilaginadhillai.
52 karththaave, Aadhimudhalaana Umadhu Niyaayaththeerppugalai Naan Ninaiththu Ennai Thetrugiren.
53 umadhu Vedhaththai Vittu Vilagugira Thunmaarkkarnimiththam Nadukkam Ennai Pidiththadhu.
54 naan Paradhesiyaai Thangum Veettile Umadhu Piramaanangal Enakku Keedhangalaayina.
55 karththaave, Raakkaalaththil Umadhu Naamaththai Ninaiththu, Umadhu Vedhaththai Kaikkollugiren.
56 naan Umadhu Kattalaigalai Kaikkondapadiyinaal, Idhu Enakku Kidaiththadhu.
57 karththaave, Neere En Pangu; Naan Umadhu Vasanangalai Kaikkolluven Endren.
58 muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ummudaiya Dhayavukkaaga Kenjugiren; Umadhu Vaakkinpadi Enakku Irangum.
59 en Vazhigalai Sindhiththukkondu, En Kaalgalai Ummudaiya Saatchigalukku Neraaga Thiruppinen.
60 umadhu Karpanaigalai Kaikkollumpadi, Naan Thaamadhiyaamal Theeviriththen.
61 dhunmaarkkarin Koottangal Ennai Kollaiyittum, Ummudaiya Vedhaththai Naan Marakkavillai.
62 umadhu Needhiyaana Niyaayaththeerppugalinimiththam, Ummai Thudhikkumpadi Paadhiraaththiriyil Ezhundhiruppen.
63 umakku Bayandhu, Umadhu Kattalaigalai Kaikkollugira Anaivarukkum Naan Thozhan.
64 karththaave, Boomi Umadhu Kirubaiyinaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Umadhu Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
65 karththaave, Umadhu Vasanaththinpadi Umadhu Adiyenai Nandraai Nadaththineer.
66 uththama Nidhaanippaiyum Arivaiyum Enakkup Podhiththarulum, Ummudaiya Karpanaigalinperil Visuvaasamaayirukkiren.
67 naan Ubaththiravappaduvadharku Mun Vazhithappi Nadandhen; Ippozhudho Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyai Kaaththu Nadakkiren.
68 dhevareer Nallavarum, Nanmai Seygiravarumaayirukkireer; Umadhu Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
69 agangaarigal Enakku Virodhamaai Poigalai Pinaikkiraargal; Naano, Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Kaikkolluven.
70 avargal Irudhayam Ninanthunni Kozhuththirukkiradhu; Naano, Ummudaiya Vedhaththil Manamagizhchchiyaayirukkiren.
71 naan Ubaththiravappattadhu Enakku Nalladhu; Adhinaal Umadhu Piramaanangalai Katrukkollugiren.
72 anegamaayiram Pon Velliyai Paarkkilum, Neer Vilambina Vedhame Enakku Nalam.
73 ummudaiya Karangal Ennai Undaakki, Ennai Uruvaakkitru; Ummudaiya Karpanaigalai Katrukkolla Ennai Unarvullavanaakkum.
74 naan Ummudaiya Vasanaththirku Kaaththirukkirapadiyaal, Umakku Bayandhavargal Ennai Kandu Sandhoshappaduvaargal.
75 karththaave, Umadhu Niyaayaththeerppugal Needhiyulladhendrum, Unmaiyinpadi Ennai Ubaththiravappaduththineerendrum Ariven.
76 neer Umadhu Adiyenukku Koduththa Umadhu Vaakkinpadi, Umadhu Kirubai Ennai Thetruvadhaaga.
77 naan Pizhaiththirukkumpadikku Umadhu Irakkangal Enakku Kidaippadhaaga; Ummudaiya Vedham En Manamagizhchchi.
78 agangaarigal Ennai Poigalinaal Kedukka Paarththapadiyaal Vetkappattuppovaargalaaga; Naano Umadhu Kattalaigalai Dhiyaanippen.
79 umakku Bayandhu, Umadhu Saatchigalai Arindhirukkiravargal Ennandaikku Thirumbuvaargalaaga.
80 naan Vetkappattu Pogaadhapadikku, En Irudhayam Umadhu Piramaanangalil Uththamamaayirukkakkadavadhu.
81 ummudaiya Ratchippukku En Aaththumaa Thavikkiradhu; Ummudaiya Vasanaththukku Kaaththirukkiren.
82 eppozhudhu Ennai Thetruveer Endru, Ummudaiya Vaakkinmel Nokkamaai En Kangal Pooththuppogiradhu.
83 pugaiyilulla Thuruththiyai Polaanen; Umadhu Piramaanangalaiyo Maraven.
84 umadhu Adiyenudaiya Naatkal Emmaaththiram? Ennai Thunbappaduththugiravargalukku Neer Eppozhudhu Niyaayaththeerppu Seyveer?
85 ummudaiya Vedhaththukku Virodhamaai Agangaarigal Enakku Kuzhigalai Vettinaargal.
86 ummudaiya Karpanaigalellaam Unmaiyaayirukkiradhu; Aniyaayamaai Ennai Thunbappaduththugiraargal; Neer Enakku Sagaayampannum.
87 avargal Ennai Boomiyiliraamal Neekkivida Satre Thappitru; Aanaalum Naan Umadhu Kattalaigalai Vittuvidavillai.
88 umadhu Kirubaiyinpadiye Ennai Uyirppiyum; Appozhudhu Naan Ummudaiya Vaakkin Saatchiyai Kaaththu Nadappen.
89 karththaave, Umadhu Vasanam Endrendraikkum Vaanangalil Nilaiththirukkiradhu.
90 ummudaiya Unmai Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Irukkum; Boomiyai Urudhippaduththineer, Adhu Nilaiththirukkiradhu.
91 ummudaiya Piramaanangalai Niraivetrumpadi Avaigal Innaalvaraikkum Nirkiradhu; Samasthamum Ummai Sevikkum.
92 umadhu Vedham En Manamagizhchchiyaayiraadhirundhaal, En Dhukkaththile Azhindhupoyiruppen.
93 naan Orupodhum Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Marakkamaatten; Avaigalaal Neer Ennai Uyirppiththeer.
94 naan Ummudaiyavan, Ennai Ratchiyum; Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Aaraaigiren.
95 dhunmaarkkar Ennai Azhikka Kaaththirukkiraargal; Naan Umadhu Saatchigalai Sindhiththukkondirukkiren.
96 sagala Sampooranaththirkum Ellaiyai Kanden; Ummudaiya Karpanaiyo Magaa Visthaaram.
97 umadhu Vedhaththil Naan Evvalavu Piriyamaayirukkiren! Naal Muzhudhum Adhu En Dhiyaanam.
98 neer Ummudaiya Karpanaigalai Kondu, Ennai En Saththurukkalilum Adhiga Gnaanamullavanaakkugireer; Avaigal Endraikkum Ennudane Irukkiradhu.
99 ummudaiya Saatchigal En Dhiyaanamaayirukkirapadiyaal, Enakku Podhiththavargal Ellaarilum Arivullavanaayirukkiren.
100 ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Naan Kaikkondirukkirapadiyaal, Mudhiyorgalai Paarkkilum Gnaanamullavanaayirukkiren.
101 ummudaiya Vasanaththai Naan Kaaththu Nadakkumpadikku, Sagala Pollaadha Vazhigalukkum En Kaalgalai Vilakkugiren.
102 neer Enakku Podhiththirukkirapadiyaal, Naan Ummudaiya Niyaayangalai Vittu Vilagen.
103 ummudaiya Vaarththaigal En Naavukku Evvalavu Inimaiyaanavaigal; En Vaaikku Avaigal Thenilum Madhuramaayirukkum.
104 umadhu Kattalaigalaal Unarvadaindhen, Aadhalaal Ellaa Poivazhigalaiyum Verukkiren.
105 ummudaiya Vasanam En Kaalgalukku Dheebamum, En Paadhaikku Velichchamumaayirukkiradhu.
106 ummudaiya Needhi Niyaayangalai Kaaththu Nadappen Endru Aanaiyitten; Adhai Niraivetruven.
107 naan Migavum Upadhthiravappadugiren; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Vasanaththinpadiye Ennai Uyirppiyum.
108 karththaave, En Vaayin Urchaagabaligalai Neer Angeegariththu, Umadhu Niyaayangalai Enakku Podhiththarulum.
109 en Piraanan Eppozhudhum En Kaiyil Irukkiradhu; Aanaalum Ummudaiya Vedhaththai Maraven.
110 dhunmaarkkar Enakku Kannivaikkiraargal; Aanaalum Naan Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Vittu Vazhi Thavaren.
111 ummudaiya Saatchigalai Niththiya Sudhandharamaakkikkondirukkiren, Avaigale En Irudhayaththin Magizhchchi.
112 mudivupariyandham Idaividaamal Ummudaiya Piramaanangalinpadi Seyya En Irudhayaththai Saaiththen.
113 veen Sindhanaigalai Naan Veruththu, Umadhu Vedhaththil Piriyappadugiren.
114 en Maraividamum En Kedagamum Neere; Ummudaiya Vasanaththukku Kaaththirukkiren.
115 pollaadhavargale, Ennaivittu Agandrupongal; En Dhevanudaiya Karpanaigalai Naan Kaikkolluven.
116 naan Pizhaiththiruppadharku Umadhu Vaarththaiyinpadi Ennai Aadhariththarulum; En Nambikkai Virudhaavaaippoga Ennai Vetkaththirku Utpaduththaadheyum.
117 ennai Aadhariththarulum; Appozhudhu Naan Ratchikkappattu, Ekkaalamum Ummudaiya Piramaanangalinperil Nokkamaayiruppen.
118 umadhu Piramaanangalaivittu Vazhivilagugira Yaavaraiyum Midhiththuppodugireer; Avargaludaiya Ubaayam Verum Poiye.
119 boomiyilulla Dhunmaarkkar Yaavaraiyum Kalimbaippola Agatrividugireer; Aagaiyaal Umadhu Saatchigalil Piriyappadugiren.
120 umakku Bayappadum Bayaththaal En Udampu Silirkkiradhu; Umadhu Niyaayaththeerppugalukku Bayappadugiren.
121 niyaayamum Needhiyum Seygiren; Ennai Odukkugiravargalukku Ennai Oppukkodaadheyum.
122 umadhu Adiyenukku Nanmaiyaaga Thunainillum; Agangaarigal Ennai Odukkavottaadheyum.
123 umadhu Ratchippukkum Umadhu Needhiyin Vaarththaikkum Kaaththirukkiradhinaal En Kangal Pooththuppogiradhu.
124 umadhu Adiyenai Umadhu Kirubaiyinpadiye Nadaththi, Umadhu Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
125 naan Umadhu Adiyen; Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Naan Ariyumpadi Ennai Unarvullavanaakkum.
126 needhiyai Seyya Karththarukku Velaivandhadhu; Avargal Ummudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththai Meerinaargal.
127 aadhalaal Naan Ponnilum Pasumponnilum Adhigamaai Umadhu Karpanaigalil Piriyappadugiren.
128 ellaavatraippatriyum Neer Arulina Ellaa Kattalaigalum Semmaiyendru Enni, Sagala Poivazhigalaiyum Verukkiren.
129 ummudaiya Saatchigal Adhisayamaanavaigal; Aagaiyaal En Aaththumaa Avaigalai Kaikkollum.
130 ummudaiya Vasanaththin Pirasiththam Velichcham Thandhu, Pedhaigalai Unarvullavargalaakkum.
131 ummudaiya Karpanaigalai Naan Vaanjikkirapadiyaal, En Vaayai Aavendru Thirandhu Avaigalukku Engugiren.
132 ummudaiya Naamaththai Nesikkiravargalukku Vazhangum Niyaayaththinpadiye Ennai Nokkippaarththu, Enakku Irangum.
133 ummudaiya Vaarththaiyile En Kaaladigalai Nilaippaduththi, Oru Aniyaayamum Ennai Aalavottaadheyum.
134 manushar Seyyum Idukkaththukku Ennai Vilakki Viduviththarulum; Appozhudhu Naan Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Kaaththukkolluven.
135 umadhu Adiyenmel Umadhu Mugaththai Piragaasikkappanni, Umadhu Piramaanangalai Enakku Podhiyum.
136 ummudaiya Vedhaththai Manushar Kaaththu Nadavaadhapadiyaal, En Kangalilirundhu Neerththaaraigal Odugiradhu.
137 karththaave, Neer Needhibarar, Umadhu Niyaayaththeerppugal Semmaiyaanavaigal.
138 neer Kattalaiyitta Saatchigal Needhiyum, Magaa Unmaiyumaanavaigal.
139 en Saththurukkal Ummudaiya Vasanangalai Marandhapadiyaal, En Bakthivairaakkiyam Ennai Patchikkiradhu.
140 umadhu Vaarththai Migavum Pudamidappattadhu, Umadhu Adiyen Adhil Piriyappadugiren.
141 naan Siriyavanum Asattai Pannappattavanumaayirukkiren; Aanaalum Umadhu Kattalaigalai Maraven.
142 ummudaiya Needhi Niththiya Needhi, Ummudaiya Vedham Saththiyam.
143 ikkattum Nerukkamum Ennai Pidiththadhu; Aanaalum Ummudaiya Karpanaigal En Manamagizhchchi.
144 ummudaiya Saatchigalin Needhi Endraikkum Nirkum; Ennai Unarvullavanaakkum, Appozhudhu Naan Pizhaiththiruppen.
145 muzhu Irudhayaththodum Kooppitten, Karththaave, En Jebaththai Kelum; Ummudaiya Piramaanangalai Kaikkolluven.
146 ummai Nokki Kooppitten, Ennai Ratchiyum; Appozhudhu Naan Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Kaaththukkolluven.
147 adhigaalaiyil Naan Ezhundhu Saththamitten; Ummudaiya Vasanaththukku Kaaththirukkiren.
148 umadhu Vasanaththai Dhiyaanikkumpadi, Kuriththa Jaamangalukku Munne En Kangal Vizhiththukkollum.
149 ummudaiya Kirubaiyinpadi En Saththaththai Kelum; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Niyaayaththinpadi Ennai Uyirppiyum.
150 theevinaiyai Pinpatrugiravargal Sameebikkiraargal; Avargal Ummudaiya Vedhaththukku Dhooramaayirukkiraargal.
151 karththaave, Neer Sameebamaayirukkireer; Umadhu Karpanaigalellaam Unmai.
152 neer Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Endrendraikkum Nirka Sthaabiththeer Enbadhai Avaigalaal Naan Nedunaalaai Arindhirukkiren.
153 en Ubaththiravaththaippaarththu, Ennai Viduviyum; Umadhu Vedhaththai Maraven.
154 enakkaaga Neer Vazhakkaadi Ennai Meettukkollum; Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Ennai Uyirppiyum.
155 ratchippu Dhunmaarkkarukku Dhooramaayirukkiradhu, Avargal Umadhu Piramaanangalai Thedaargal.
156 karththaave, Ummudaiya Irakkangal Migudhiyaayirukkiradhu; Umadhu Niyaayangalinpadi Ennai Uyirppiyum.
157 ennai Thunbappaduththugiravargalum Ennai Virodhikkiravargalum Anegar; Aanaalum Ummudaiya Saatchigalai Vittu Vilagen.
158 umadhu Vasanaththai Kaaththukkollaadha Thurogigalai Naan Kandapodhu, Enakku Aruvaruppaayirundhadhu.
159 idho, Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Nesikkiren; Karththaave, Umadhu Kirubaiyinpadi Ennai Uyirppiyum.
160 ummudaiya Vasanam Samoolamum Saththiyam, Ummudaiya Needhi Niyaayamellaam Niththiyam.
161 pirabukkal Kaaranamillaamal Ennai Thunbappaduththinaargal; Aanaalum En Irudhayam Umadhu Vasanaththirke Bayappadugiradhu.
162 migundha Kollaiyudaimaiyai Kandupidikkiravan Magizhugiradhupola, Naan Umadhu Vaarththaiyinperil Magizhugiren.
163 poiyai Pagaiththu Aruvarukkiren; Ummudaiya Vedhaththaiyo Nesikkiren.
164 umadhu Needhi Niyaayangalinimiththam, Orunaalil Ezhudharam Ummai Thudhikkiren.
165 ummudaiya Vedhaththai Nesikkiravargalukku Migundha Samaadhaanamundu; Avargalukku Idaralillai.
166 karththaave, Ummudaiya Ratchippukku Naan Kaaththirundhu, Ummudaiya Karpanaigalinpadi Seygiren.
167 en Aaththumaa Umadhu Saatchigalai Kaakkum; Avaigalai Naan Migavum Nesikkiren.
168 umadhu Kattalaigalaiyum Umadhu Saatchigalaiyum Kaaththu Nadakkiren; En Vazhigalellaam Umakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu.
169 karththaave, En Kooppidudhal Umadhu Sannidhiyil Varuvadhaaga; Umadhu Vasanaththinpadiye Ennai Unarvullavanaakkum.
170 en Vinnappam Umadhu Sannidhiyil Varuvadhaaga; Umadhu Vaarththaiyinpadi Ennai Viduviththarulum.
171 ummudaiya Piramaanangalai Neer Enakku Podhikkumpodhu, En Udhadugal Umadhu Thudhiyai Pirasthaabappaduththum.
172 umadhu Karpanaigalellaam Needhiyullavaigal; Aadhalaal, En Naavu Ummudaiya Vasanaththai Vivariththuchchollum.
173 naan Ummudaiya Kattalaigalai Therindhukondapadiyaal, Umadhu Karam Enakku Thunaiyaayiruppadhaaga.
174 karththaave, Ummudaiya Ratchippinmel Aavalaayirukkiren; Ummudaiya Vedham En Manamagizhchchi.
175 en Aaththumaa Pizhaiththirundhu Ummai Thudhikkakkadavadhu; Umadhu Niyaayaththeerppugal Enakku Udhaviyaayiruppadhaaga.
176 kaanaamarpona Aattaippola Vazhidhappipponen; Umadhu Adiyenai Theduveeraaga; Umadhu Karpanaigalai Naan Maraven.
